packs.name: Essentials
packs.description: This knowledge pack helps you to learn the basic geographical and political facts about each state.

packs.name: Booster
packs.description: This knowledge pack helps you to learn some interesting, historical and fun facts about each state.

packs.name: Bull's Eye
packs.description: How accurately you can locate the states on the map? This game measures your confidence

packs.name: This is Sparta
packs.description: This game is a fun way to learn about places. Questions will be asked realted to places and you need to answer them by identifying the place on the map
